VehicleConfigDetailsMandate: . Vehicle configuration details are mandatory for vehicle
VehicleComponentsMandate: . Vehicle component details are mandatory for vehicle
ConfigNameLength: . Vehicle name is too long (max. 100 characters)~
MovementClassMismatch: . Movement classification not match previous vehicle movement classification~
ConfigNotesLength: . Vehicle notes is too long (max. 200 characters)~
OverallLengthSize: . Overall length input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
RigidLengthSize: . Rigid length input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
OverallWidthSize: . Overall width input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
MaxHeightSize: . Max height input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
GrossWeightSize: . Gross weight input size is too long (max. 8 precision digits)~
SpeedSize: . Speed input size is too long (max. 4 precision digits)~
ComponentNameNotFound: . Vehicle component name is not found~
ComponentNameLength: . Vehicle component name is too long (max. 100 characters)~
ComponentNotesLength: . Vehicle component notes is too long (max. 200 characters)~
InitialComponentError: . First component should be a tractor~
ComponentSubTypeNotFound: . Component sub type is not found~
ComponentTypeMismatch: . Component type is not valid based on vehicle type~
ComponentSubTypeMismatch: . Component sub type is not valid based on component type~
InvalidComponentHeightSize: . Height input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
InvalidComponentRedHeightSize: . Reducible height input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
InvalidComponentLengthSize: . Length input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
InvalidComponentWidthSize: . Width input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
InvalidLeftOverHangSize: . Left overhang input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
InvalidRightOverHangSize: . Right overhang input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
InvalidFrontOverHangSize: . Front overhang input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
InvalidRearOverHangSize: . Rear overhang input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
InvalidGroundClearanceSize: . Ground Clearance input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
InvalidOutsideTrackSize: . Outside track input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
InvalidReducibleGroundClearanceSize: . Reducible ground clearance input size is too long  (max. 5 precision digits)~
InvalidAxleSpacingToFollowingSize: . Axle spacing to follow input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits)~
InvalidDistanceToNextAxle: . Invalid distance to next axle for axle
MismatchInDistanceToNextAxle: . Mismatch in axle space to following and distance to next axle for last axle~
InvalidDistanceToNextAxleForLast: . Invalid distance to next axle for last axle~
InvalidDistanceToNextAxleSize: . Distance to next axle input size is too long (max. 5 precision digits) for axle
InvalidAxleWeightSize: . Axle weight input size is too long (max. 8 precision digits) for axle
MismatchInWheelSpacingCount: . Mismatch in wheel spacing count for axle
ReducibleHeightGreaterthanHeight: . Reducible height is greater than component height~
TotalGrossWeightLesser: . Gross weight is less than sum of component axle weight~
MismatchInOverAllWidth: . Overall width should be equal to maximum width of the components~
MismatchInRigidLength: . Rigid length should be equal to maximum length of the components~
GreaterRigidLength: . Rigid length is greater than overall length~
GreaterCompRigidLength: . Maximum rigid length of component is greater than overall length~
WheelBaseGreater: . Wheelbase(sum of axle distance) is greater than overall length~
GreaterCompLength: . Overall Length is lesser than sum of component lengths~
MismatchInMaxHeight: . Maximum height should be equal to maximum height of the components~
MovementClassError: . The movement classification assessed by ESDAL as per the legislations, based on the vehicle data received is ;, whereas the movement classification in vehicle configuration received is ;.Correct and send the vehicle data or movement classification, whichever is applicable.~
RearOverHangMandate: . Rear overhang is required only for last component~
FrontOverHangMandate: . Front overhang is required only for first component~
RigidLengthNotMandate: . Rigid length is not required for
RigidLengthInCorrect: . Rigid length should be equal to overall length for vehicle type
RearSteerNotRequired: . Rear steerable is not required for component type
LengthNotMandate: . Length is not required for component type
GroundClearanceNotMandate: . Ground clearance is not required for component type
OutsideTrackNotMandate: . Outside track is not required for component type
AxleCountNotMandate: . Axle count is not required for component type
AxleDetailsNotMandate: . Axle details are not required for component type
WheelSpacingNotMandate: . Wheel spacing is not required for component type
WheelSpacingMandate: . Wheel spacing is required for component type
TyreSizeMandate: . Tyre size is required for component type
TyreSizeNoMandate: . Tyre size is not required for component type
DrawbarGrossWeightInCorrect: . Gross weight does not match with the heaviest component weight~
ReducibleGroundClearanceNotMandate: . Reducible ground clearance not required for
MovementTypeMismatch: . Vehicle data received doesn't match the initial vehicle movement type~
VehicleInSufficient: . Vehicles are not sufficient to assign route~
CompGrossWeightNotMandate: . Component weight is not required for
AxleWeightExceed: . Component weight should be greater than or equal to sum of axles weight~
